usecases.title: Feature extraction
usecases.description: Extracts electrophysiological features; traces can be from NeuroInformatics Platform or uploaded

usecases.description: Fitting synaptic events using data and model in NeuroInformatics Platform

usecases.description: Fitting synaptic events using data in NeuroInformatics Platform and user's model

files.entryname: Synaptic events fitting with user model
Synaptic events fitting with user model analysis

usecases.description: Fitting user's synaptic events data with model from NeuroInformatics Platform

files.entryname: Synaptic events fitting with user data
Synaptic events fitting with user data analysis

usecases.title: Hodgkin-Huxley Neuron Builder
usecases.description: Use the eFEL and BluePyOpt libraries to go through the entire neuron builder pipeline: 1) feature extraction, 2) model optimization, 3) simulation.

usecases.title: Rebuild an existing single hippocampal cell model
usecases.description: Use the BluePyOpt to re-run an optimization with your choices for the parameters range

files.entryname: Rebuild Single HippoCell - NSG Job Manager

usecases.title: Build your own single hippocampal cell model using HBP data
usecases.description: Use the BluePyOpt to run an optimization choosing from HBP data for morphology, channel kinetics, features, and parameters.

files.entryname: BuildOwn Single HippoCell - NSG Job Manager

usecases.title: Mono compartmental Cerebellar Granule cell optimization
usecases.description: Using BluePyOpt to optimize a single compartmental cerebellar granule cell. All the parameters, channels and morphology can be modified. This version runs directly on the collaboratory and it is limited to small optimizations

files.entryname: Mono compartmental Cerebellar Granule cell optimization

usecases.title: Multi compartmental Cerebellar Granule cell optimization
usecases.description: Using BluePyOpt to optimize a multcompartmental cerebellar granule cell composed by four dendrites, soma and a custom multi segmented axon. All the parameters, channels and morphology can be modified. This version runs directly on the collaboratory and it is limited to small optimizations

files.entryname: Multi compartmental Cerebellar Granule cell optimization

usecases.title: Custom Axon Cerebellar Granule cell simulation
usecases.description: The purpose of this usecase it to explain how to setup an axon, built with BluePyOpt, containing an erbitrary number of sections. Afterward to simulate an actual cerebellar granule cell model with an axon composed by over 300 sections.

files.entryname: Custom Axon Cerebellar Granule cell simulation

usecases.title: Simulation and validation of a mouse Purkinje cell multicompartmental model
usecases.description: Simulation and validation of a mouse Purkinje cell multicompartmental model obtained from BluePyOpt optimizer. The purpose of this usecase it to extract, simulate and validated a series of physiologically correct Purkinje cells. This notebook runs directly on the Collab and does not require HPC resources

usecases.title: Optimize a striatal fast-spiking interneuron
usecases.description: Fit parameters of a striatal fast-spiking interneuron model to the experimental data. Optimization uses BluePyOpt as well as the realistic morphology, channel kinetics and extracted neurophysiological features. This version runs directly on the collaboratory and it is limited to small optimizations.

usecases.title: Synaptic plasticity
usecases.description: Configure and test different synaptic plasticity models and protocols

usecases.title: Build your own single hippocampal cell model using HBP and your own data
usecases.description: Use the BluePyOpt to run an optimization choosing/uploading morphology, channel kinetics, features, and parameters.

usecases.description: Create your own single hippocampal cell Model with data from NeuroInformatics Platform

usecases.description: Export single hippocampal cell model into NeuroML (Open Souce Brain)

usecases.description: Define the properties and the location of the neurons for a brain region of detailed neuron models

models.title: Mouse O1 - Scaffold Somatosensory Cortex Microcircuit for Mouse
models.description: This model combines specific datasets obtained for mouse somatosensory cortex, models of neuronal electrophysiology constrained to mouse primary visual cortex data from the Allen Cell Types Database, and datasets that were algorithmically transformed from rat to mouse.

models.title: Rat hippocampus CA1
models.description: A circuit of detailed neuron models based on the Ascoli atlas.

Functional Simulation with Advanced Point Neurons (E-GLIF)
models.cell_soma_location: cerebellar cortex, Deep Cerebellar Nuclei and Inferior Olive
models.description: Olivocerebellar microcircuit simulation with E-GLIF point neurons in PyNEST

models.title: Multicompartmental simulation of the cerebellum
models.description: This usecase models the cerebellum's anisotropic topology through the use of multicompartmental neuron models that are connected to eachother based on spatial intersection of the neurites.

usecases.title: Cerebro-Cerebellar loops
usecases.description: This use-case shows a modeling effort of whole brain functionalities by leveraging on the existing cerebellar models. We model and simulate the forward and inverse controller functions of the cerebrocortical-cerebellar loops in a closed-loop setting, emulating error-based learning and action prediction.

models.title: Cerebro-cerebellar closed-loop experiment
models.cell_soma_location: cerebellar cortex, Deep Cerebellar Nuclei and Inferior Olive

models.title: Configure and run a mouse Somatosensory Cortex microcircuit using preconfigured HBP model and data
models.description: A draft reconstruction of the mouse somatosensory microcircuit.
